I think that's exactly what he means.  When I first started wr=
iting
Junit tests I had many assertions in my test methods.  Lately, as I
l=
earn more about TDD, I've been trying to limit my unit tests to only
one as=
sertion per test method.  I find that by having only one assertion
per test=
 method it keeps my tests much more focused and easier to
understand.  Once=
 I get more than 2 or 3 assertions in a test method I
start to look at how =
I can split that one test up into 2 or more tests.
Give it a try, you might=
 find that you like it.

Kris
